about_the_game:
EON:Reset is a Metroidvania game with a focus on combat and puzzle solving. The game blends a serious sci-fi documents of paranormals, with fast-paced combat to create a mysterious and occult world.

In this world, there exists a mysterious organization called EON Association of Reality Stability. They secretly contain paranormal entities and have the protection of the human world as their main purpose. The player will play as an artificial combat-use lifeform created by the association, called EON-3033, which was activated after the catastrophe that destroyed the association and the entire human world. Following the order of the association, EON-3033 must find the truth behind the catastrophe and reverse the future in a world on the brink of destruction.
detailed_description:
Crisis Relief

Each month, HoHo Game Studio will contribute 5% of earnings to the United Nations Crisis Relief, providing support to those affected by wars, hunger, and natural disasters. This commitment applies to all our current and future games, and we will share our monthly donation updates on our social media platforms.

short_description: Explore EON Association in the wake of an apocalyptic disaster. Maneuver the artificial life EON-3033 to battle paranormal entities. Experience an exciting 2D combat in a world where elemental forces exist. Peel back the threads of ambiguous narrative and discover the secrets of time and fate.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
